attributes.action: call a general election within the next 12 months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The vast majority of people in this country have had enough of this government and its failed/ing policies, deceit and taxation.  As voting members and the fact we live in a democracy, we should be able to demand a general election so that we can vote for a leader who choose and believe in.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
